author: mmusich
body:
To address https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/43755.
Needed for https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/43856

Update includes: 
 - `Run3ScoutingElectron` (version 7)
 - `Run3ScoutingPhoton` (version 6)
 - `Run3ScoutingVertex` (version 4)
title: Add data file for update of Scouting DataFormats in CMSSW_14_0_0_pre3
